DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, it flies back into your draw pile and leaves a #yFeather in your hand.
Draw a card from your Spell Pile. If your Spell Pile is empty, immediately refresh it and #yUpgrade each Spell for every #b5 #yStrength you have.
Chant effects activate during play if you played a Power while this card was in hand.

Hexxed creatures gain additional #yHex whenever you play a non-Attack card. Powers increase #yHex by #b3 [REMOVE_SPACE]. Creatures with #b10 #yHex take #rdouble #rdamage from the next Attack. Additional #yHex can't be stacked during this time.
Any effect that causes you to lose [E] , even if you had none to lose.
